txt.en: 'The Dunlendings at Cuvnerth have been gathering large stores of supplies for the army in Wulf's Cleft. These supplies are vital for their impending invasion, and it may be that without them, the army might be crippled.\n\n'Would you be willing to travel south-east to Cuvnerth and destroy the supplies?'
'With the supply stores at Cuvnerth destroyed, the Wulf's Cleft army will have to take time to gather more supplies before they march.'
'Destroy their stores, [placeholder], and we might have a chance!'
Within the village of Cuvnerth, the Dunlendings have amassed a large amount of supply stores for the impending attack.
The village of Cuvnerth lies to the south-east of Garrun's camp.\n\nGarrun asked you to enter the village of Cuvnerth and destroy the supplies they have been stocking.
Talk to Garrun in the Isendale
Garrun's camp lies to the west of Cuvnerth.\n\nYou should return to Garrun with news of your success.
